page.title: 05SHOPPING IN SALTCOATS
page.content: The shopping centre in{Saltcoats serves a wide area, with people travelling from up to{20 miles away}to do their weekly shopping. As Saltcoats has grown in importance, the nearby shopping centres in Ardrossan and Stevenston have gone into decline. The main shopping area -{DOCKHEAD St - has{chain stores}like "BOOTS" and "WOOLWORTHS". It is currently being {pedestrianised}and this is meeting with a mixed reception - in a survey done for{DOMESDAY}80% of the public liked it but only 34% of the shopkeepers liked it, claiming that they had lost trade because of it. A new{indoor arcade}opened recently at the periphery of the town centre but is proving unsuccessful.
